Learnvest: Web & Security Engineer: New York, NY: 
We are looking for 3 security related people to come onboard as in a direct hire capacity.  We need a Web Security Engineer who can build and automate tools, scan code and secure our web environment, a Security Generalist with a Python background and experience with packet analyses, securing cloud infrastructures, and lastly a Info Sec/Risk Specialist.  Money is commensurate with experience.  Please email lligouri@learnvest.com or call at 646.780.8401.
